name: @jakesidsmith/tsassert
description: Check TypeScript types against assertion comments

scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.dist.json && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.lint: npm run prettier-check && npm run typecheck && npm run lint-js
scripts.tests: ./dist/cli.js assertions/pass.ts && if ./dist/cli.js assertions/fail.ts; then echo 'Failing tests passed' && exit 1; else echo 'All tests successfully passed or failed'; fi && ./dist/cli.js --project tsconfig.excludes.json && echo 'Failing files were successfully excluded'
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run dist && npm run tests

author: Jake 'Sid' Smith
